keyTakeAways: The remains of Kada Scott, a 23-year-old woman missing for about two weeks, were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia.
Keon King, 21, of Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, causing or risking a catastrophe, conspiracy, and possible homicide.
DNA tests confirmed that the remains belong to Kada Scott, and investigators believe King had cell phone contact with her and used a stolen vehicle linked to her disappearance.
The black Hyundai Accent, reported stolen on October 4, was seen parked near the recreation center on that evening and later found on fire, with its body compacted at a junkyard.
King was previously arrested in another kidnapping case, but charges were dropped due to lack of court appearances; he is now facing new charges related to Scott’s case.
Prosecutors say there may be additional individuals involved in the case, and investigations are ongoing into possible broader criminal activity.
Kada Scott, who worked in an assisted living facility, was remembered by her parents as a person of light, kindness, and beautiful spirit; her family expressed deep grief and requested prayers.

summaryOfNewsArticle: In Philadelphia, the remains of 23-year-old missing woman Kada Scott were discovered in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school, following an anonymous tip prompting investigators to re-examine the area. DNA tests confirmed her identity. Keon King, a 21-year-old man from Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, conspiracy, and possibly homicide. Evidence includes cell phone tracking, video footage showing a stolen Hyundai Accent parked near the recreation center the night Scott vanished, and the car later found on fire. Investigators believe other individuals may be involved, and the case remains under active investigation. Scott, who worked in an assisted living facility, was remembered by her family as a source of kindness and light; her parents expressed deep grief and asked for prayers.
title: Remains found behind abandoned school belong to missing Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, officials say
